overview: Greg is responsible for Fanscape’s overall operations which includes the day-to-day operations, strategic planning, finance, IT and HR. He is also charged with supporting the agency’s launch of new services in the areas of social media consulting, outsourcing and ROI reporting. Greg has more than 15 years of retail and experiential marketing experience at the executive level in the consumer electronics and technology industries. He is a graduate of the The Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania.
